Synopsis: 


1 - The Promise of the Rose 

Discusses the childhood of Mamoru Chiba, and his friendship with a boy named Fiore, who is actually an alien newly arrived in the land. 


2 - Hearts In Ice. 

A cold wave of menacing meteor above the Earth way. The Snow Queen sends crystals on the planet, important instruments for its plan to freeze the planet and destroy all life. Entrretanto, a crystal was found by an innocent astronomer whose life is in danger now. Can sailors help the astronomer and defeat the Snow Queen before it's too late? 


3 - Black Hole of Dreams 

Around the world, the children sleep. Unaware of the danger lurking in the shadows. But tonight, a strange darkness floats in the wind. And the children, one by one, begin to disappear. It seems to be a supernatural force that feeds on their dreams. The evil queen, Badiyanu, fairies and his faithful assistant in the use of the "Black Dream Hole" to swallow the earth. It is up to Sailor Moon and Sailor Soldiers to prevent the approaching darkness. 


Good fun :)
